line_2: Which daily had my Eyes bedew'd,

line_1: An useless gift, it meets ingratitude?
line_2: And where's the wonder, when we will obtrude
Who like the Furies is indu'd
Nay, sure, Sir, 'twould be very rude,

line_1: They, O perverse and base ingratitude!
line_2: For which above their mates they were endued
